comment.author: 57098752@N07
comment._content: The Abbey was founded by Donal Mor O'Brien for the Augustinian Canons in1189. It was dedicated to Saints Peter and Paul.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: It is indeed still standing. Look at this beautiful shot from just before Christmas 2009 on Sparky No. 1's photostream: www.flickr.com/photos/37507409@N08/4208408015/
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 47044499@N03
comment._content: That is so nice - thank you for the link. I'd love to photograph that myself - maybe I will if my Polish wife continues to remind me of my promise to take her to Ireland.
